name: struggle-bug
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black-white: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets’ Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
